profile_positions.description:
I was hired by the main shareholder of Stahl (Wendel group, French, Paris based PE) to help to develop the company in its way upwards. During these years Stahl acquired several (leather) chemical competitors and achieved significant synergies. 
The Ebitda increased from about EUR 45 m in ancient days to about EUR 200 after successfully having incorporated the acquisitions. 
The year 2019 was the perfect moment to hand over to my successor : Frank Sonnemans, who should be able to help the company growing further.

Since the moment of handing over to Frank, and in fact retiring from that position I was appointed as member of the advisory committee of Martens bouwstoffen. Next to that I am chairman of the representing body of the pension fund of DHL in the Netherlands
